General.Name: Fair Oaks Income Limited
General.Description: Fair Oaks Income Limited is a feeder fund launched and managed by Fair Oaks Capital Limited. The fund invests its entire corpus in FOIF II LP and FOMC III LP. Fair Oaks Income Limited was formed on March 7, 2014 and is domiciled in the Channel Islands.
General.Address: 152 West 57 Street, New York, NY, United States, 10019
